name: LongrunningJob
title: Google
Cloud
Bigtable
LongrunningJob
description:
LongrunningJob

A resource representing the long-running, asynchronous processing operation. The job can be refreshed to retrieve the result object once the operation has been completed.

returns.description: nil if the operation is not complete.

methods.name: done?
title: Google
Cloud
Bigtable
LongrunningJob#done?
methods.description: Checks if the processing of the instance operation is complete.

methods.name: error?
title: Google
Cloud
Bigtable
LongrunningJob#error?
methods.description: Checks if the processing of the instance operation has errored.

methods.name: error
title: Google
Cloud
Bigtable
LongrunningJob#error
methods.description: The status if the operation associated with this job produced an error.

returns.description: A status object with the status code and message, or nil if no error occurred.

methods.name: reload!
title: Google
Cloud
Bigtable
LongrunningJob#reload!
methods.description: Reloads the job with current data from the long-running, asynchronous processing of an operation.

methods.name: wait_until_done!
title: Google
Cloud
Bigtable
LongrunningJob#wait_until_done!
methods.description: Reloads the job until the operation is complete. The delay between reloads will incrementally increase.
